briefTitle: Trial of Netarsudil for Prevention of Corticosteroid-induced Intraocular Pressure Elevation
officialTitle: Randomized, Double-masked, Placebo-controlled Evaluation of Netarsudil for Prevention of Corticosteroid-induced Intraocular Pressure Elevation
summary: Cornea transplant recipients who are using topical corticosteroids long-term to prevent transplant rejection will be randomized to use netarsudil or placebo.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: from date of randomization until the date of first documented intraocular pressure elevation exceeding defined threshold up to 9 months

commonTop: Ocular irritation considered related to study drug use
